about_the_game:
Aboard SCP-455, an abandoned monolithic cargo ship that has run aground somewhere off of the coast of Chile, you find yourself having lost your team and with
no radio or guidance. Make your way out of SCP-455 which by now has become a sprawling maze trying it's best to seal you into your new tomb.

You can't fight back, use the environment to your advantage, find hidden backrooms or passages, use vents and air ducts to make your way around procedurally generated labyrinths. Stay in the light and stay away from anything that moves. Good Luck.

Featuring
  • Multiple enemy types.
  • A story spanning multiple mazes and floors.
  • An Endless mode!
  • 100s of collectables
  • Replay Mode
  • and so much more!

Aboard SCP-455, an abandoned monolithic cargo ship that has run aground somewhere off of the coast of Chile, you find yourself having lost your team and with

You can't fight back, use the environment to your advantage, find hidden backrooms or passages, use vents and air ducts to make your way around procedurally generated labyrinths. Stay in the light and stay away from anything that moves. Good Luck.

Featuring

  • A story spanning multiple mazes and floors.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050ti or newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: x86 and x64 Compatible.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra or newer
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050ti or newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: SCP-455

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050ti or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: x86 and x64 Compatible.

short_description: Aboard SCP-455, an abandoned monolithic cargo ship that has run aground somewhere off of the coast of Chile, you find yourself having lost your team and with no radio or guidance. Make your way out of SCP-455 which by now has become a sprawling maze trying it's best to seal you into your new tomb.
